title: Presentation of the 205th and 206th Recommendations and the 190th Convention of the International Labour Organization in Parliament
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Minister of Skills Development, Employment and Labour Relations,  to present the following Recommendations and the Convention adopted at the 108th and 106th session of the International Labour Conference, in Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet. 

	At the 108th session of the International Labour Conference held in the year 2019 : 

Convention 190	-	Convention concerning the Elimination of Violence and Harassment in the World of Work 

Recommendation 206	-	Recommendation concerning the Elimination of Violence and Harassment in the World of Work

	At the 106th session of the International Labour Conference held in the year 2017 : 

Recommendation 205	-	Recommendation concerning Employment and Decent Work for Peace and Resilience
